name: Text Based Fishing
description:
A text based fishing game. 

Current features include: catching a variety of fish and trash, being able to purchase tanks for an aquarium, earning money from the aquarium and fishing, and a log that tracks how many of each fish you have caught.

This game is in it's early stages so feel free to leave feedback and suggest changes/new features!

You can send feedback via comments and/or emailing Woodyard173@gmail.com
